testsuite.name: TrafficLightTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1 (19)?[0m Welcome to the traffic management system! Input the number of roads: > 5 Input the interval: > 3 Menu: 1. Add road 2. Delete road 3. Open System 0. Quit > 1 Road added Menu: 1. Add road 2. Delete road 3. Open System 0. Quit > 2 Road deleted Menu: 1. Add road 2. Delete road 3. Open System 0. Quit > 3 System opened Menu: 1. Add road 2. Delete road 3. Open System 0. Quit > 0 Bye!
